title: Doctoral Student
description: I am pursuing a PhD in AI and robotics under the supervision of Professor Marc deisenroth and Professor Dimitrios Kanoulas.

title: PhD Research Intern - Mobile Robotics
company: National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST)
description: During this internship, I worked on safe motion planning with mobile robots in crowded spaces (shopping malls, science museums, etc) using generative models.

title: Postgraduate Teaching Assistant
description: I helped develop and assess student coursework in C++ (covering robot sensing, interaction, and manipulation).

title: Data Scientist
description: I was part of a team developing data-science training courses for corporate South Africa mean new graduates.

title: MSc Research Intern - Field Robotics
company: Council for Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR)
description: This internship ran alongside my masters degree. My additional responsibilities included developing and maintaining software for control and perception of a mobile manipulator robot.
